item.description:
July is such a beautiful month in Maine!  I know people are going on vacations and much busier at this time of year so am suggesting we meet on the Wed. 27th. If there isn't enough interest this month we'll wait until next. So sign up as soon as you know. :) 

We'll see where everyone is with the law of attraction and how we can implement it everyday into our lives. Come with positive attitudes! There will be a small donation to cover costs $3-$5.

Stay cool and enjoy time with your family!

Caryn
item.how_to_find_us: It's in Scarborough, if you're new I'll e-mail you the address,
item.name: Watch a movie and have a discussion!
